gurmukhi: jb hI jwq qiRbyxI Bey ]puMn dwn idn krq ibqey ]1]
transliteration: Jab Hoo Jaat Tribaanoo Bhae|| Pounn Daan Din Karat Bitae||1||
translation: When he went to Triveni (Prayag), he passed his days in act of charity.1.

gurmukhi: qhI pRkws hmwrw BXo ]ptnw shr ibKY Bv lXo ]
transliteration: Tahoo Prakaas Hamaaraa Bhayo|| Patnaa Sahar Bikhai Bhav Layo||
translation: I was conceived there and took birth at Patna.

gurmukhi: m`dR dys hm ko ly Awey ]BwNiq BwNiq dweIAin dulrwey ]2]
transliteration: Maddra Des Ham Ko Le Aae|| Bhaant(i) Bhaant(i) Daaooan(i) Dulraae||2||
translation: Whence I was brought to Madra Desh (Punjab), where I was caressed by various nurses.2

gurmukhi: kInI Aink BwNiq qn r`Cw ]dInI BwNiq BwNiq kI is`Cw ]
transliteration: Koonoo Anik Bhaant Tan Rachchhaad| Doonoo Bhaant(i) Bhaant(i) Koo Sichchaa||
translation: I was given physical protection in various ways and given various types of education.

gurmukhi: jb hm Drm krm mo Awey ]dyv lok qb ipqw isDwey ]3]
transliteration: Jab Ham Dharam Karam Mo Aae|| Dev Lok Tab Pitaa Sidhaae||3||
translation: When I began to perform the act of Dharma (righteousness), my father departed for his heavenly abode.3.

gurmukhi: ieiq sRI bicqR nwtk gRMQy kib jnm kQnM nwm spqmo iDAwie smwpq msqu suB msqu ]7]APjU ]282]
transliteration: It(i) Sroo Bachitra Naatak Granthe Kabi Janam Kathanan Naam Saptmo Dhiaae Samaapat Mast(u) Soubh Mast(u)||7||afju||282||
translation: End of the Seventh Chapter of BACHITTTAR NATAK entitled Description of the Poet.7.282
Here begins the Description of the Magnificence of Authority:

gurmukhi: rwj swj hm pr jb AwXo ]jQw skq qb Drm clwXo ]
transliteration: Raaj Saaj Ham Par Jah Aayo|| Jathaa Sakat Tab Dharam Chalaayo||
translation: When I obtained the position of responsibility, I performed the religious acts to the best of my ability.

gurmukhi: BwNiq BwNiq bn Kyl iskwrw ]mwry rIC roJ JMKwrw ]1]
transliteration: Bhaant(i) Bhaant(i) Ban Khel Sikaaraa|| Mdare Roochh Rojh Jhankhaaraa||1||
translation: I went hunting various kinds of animals in the forest and killed bears, nilgais (blue bulls) and elks.1.

gurmukhi: dys cwl hm qy puin BeI ]shr pwNvtw kI suiD leI ]
transliteration: Des Dhaal Ham Te Poun(i) Bhaoo|| Sahar Paanvtaa Koo Sudh(i) Laoo||
translation: Then I left my home and went to place named Paonta.

gurmukhi: kwilMdRI qit kry iblwsw ]Aink BwNq ky pyK qmwmw ]2]
transliteration: Kaalindroo Tattee Dare Bilaasaa|| Anik Bhaant(i) Ke Pekh Tamaasaa||2||
translation: I enjoyed my stay on the banks of Kalindri (Yamuna) and saw amusement of various kind2.

gurmukhi: qh ky isMG Gny cuin mwry ]roJ rIC bhu BwNiq ibdwry ]
transliteration: Tah Ke Singh Ghane Choun(i) Mdare|| Rojh Roochh Bahu Bhaant(i) Biddare||
translation: There I killed may lions, nilgais and bears.
